item.title: Post: "Charming Victorian" also means "Creepy As Hell"
item.description: Thought you might want to know. creepy face in light fixture uplit by chandelier
item.content:encoded:
Thought you might want to know.

creepy face in light fixture uplit by chandelier

item.title: Post: home
item.description: Don’t you judge us, Winona. Two weeks is a long time to be away.
item.content:encoded: Don’t you judge us, Winona. Two weeks is a long time to be away.

item.title: Post: tmux and laundry art
item.description: I made a toot and then I realized it’s the sort of thing that should be a note here for the next time I forget. Sure I got work stuff done today but my biggest accomplishment was getting tmux to show inbox/ISO 8601 time in the status bar. `set -g status-right "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M%z"` Might as well share yesterday’s laundry day doodle while I’m at it. Very bright. I blame California. I drew this while doing laundry Sunday
item.content:encoded:
I made a toot and then I realized it’s the sort of thing that should be a note here for the next time I forget.

Sure I got work stuff done today but my biggest accomplishment was getting tmux to show inbox/ISO 8601 time in the status bar.

Might as well share yesterday’s laundry day doodle while I’m at it. Very bright. I blame California.

I drew this while doing laundry Sunday

item.title: Post: 6 Days 21 Hours 30 Minutes To Home
item.description: Missing my sweetheart, my home office, and my Roost stand, but it’s not all bad. Work moved me from the hostel to the Queen Anne Hotel.
item.content:encoded: Missing my sweetheart, my home office, and my Roost stand, but it’s not all bad. Work moved me from the hostel to the Queen Anne Hotel.

item.title: Post: Artist's rendition of my sinuses
item.description: Got my allergy meds at least, so I feel better than an hour ago.
item.content:encoded: Got my allergy meds at least, so I feel better than an hour ago.

item.title: Post: roar
item.description: Bit tired to roar right now, though. I left my hostel early and got back late. Killing a little time while my phone charges.
item.content:encoded: Bit tired to roar right now, though. I left my hostel early and got back late. Killing a little time while my phone charges.

item.title: Post: 12 days 5 hours 28 minutes to home
item.description: Drinking leftover coffee from yesterday’s wanderings. Not to worry, I’ll get more. Just needed something quick before I get lost on BART again.
item.content:encoded: Drinking leftover coffee from yesterday’s wanderings. Not to worry, I’ll get more. Just needed something quick before I get lost on BART again.

item.title: Post: I should be sleeping
item.description: — but I’m real curious to explore. This is my world the next couple of weeks, sleeping near the red dot on the right, and working by that star to the left: Coffee Meets Bagel headquarters.
item.content:encoded: — but I’m real curious to explore. This is my world the next couple of weeks, sleeping near the red dot on the right, and working by that star to the left: Coffee Meets Bagel headquarters.

item.title: Post: Ugh
item.description: Just getting to the good part of moving — the home office is almost all set up — and now I have to prep for a work trip. So annoying.
item.content:encoded:
Just getting to the good part of moving — the home office is almost all set up — and now I have to prep for a work trip.

So annoying.
